savingsaccount package¶

Submodules¶

savingsaccount.savingsaccount module¶

class savingsaccount.savingsaccount.savingsaccount(balance, interestRate)[source]¶

Bases: account

The savings account class has methods to to manage the specified accounts balance and interest rate of a savings account

Args:

account (account): class that includes methods to change balance and interest rate

__init__(balance, interestRate)[source]¶

constructs the savings account with a specified balance and interest rate

Variables:

  • __balance – balance of this account

  • __interestRate – interest rate of this account

Args:

balance (float): Balance of the account interestRate (float): Interest Rate

setInterestRate(interestRate: float)[source]¶

Sets interest rate for the specified account

Args:

interestRate (float): interest rate

getInterestRate()[source]¶

Returns the Interest Rate for the specified account

Returns:

float: Interest Rate

getInterest()[source]¶

Returns the amount of interest an account has accrued

Returns:

float: interest

credit(amount: float)[source]¶

Increases balance of the specified account by the specified amount and times it by the interest rate of the specified savings account

Args:

amount (float): amount to increase the balance by

__str__()[source]¶

Returns the string representation of the calling savings account

Returns:

str: string representation of the calling savings account

__eq__(other)[source]¶

Tests if the savings account is equal to the specified object, if nor returns False

Args:

other: specified object

Returns:

boolean: If the calling savings account is equal to the specified object, returns true. Returns False if not
